objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

FacilityRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

PropertyRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

PropertyRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

DescriptiveContentRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

TimeZone.description: Describes the local time zone in which the hotel is located. This could include additional information regarding time zones (e.g., Daylight Saving Time observed), a proprietary code, the difference between the local time and GMT.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

areaWeather.description: Description of the weather typical to the hotel facility's area.

whenBuilt.description: The date this property was built.

PropertyStatusDescription.description: This is a description of the operating status of the Property. This information may support the code in PropertyStatus.

daylightSavingsInd.description: When false, indicates the location does not observe Daylight Saving Time.

iSO9000CertifiedInd.description: When true, the hotel indicates they are ISO 9000 certified.

Area.description: Describes the specific area or areas of a hotel being renovated.

CompletionDate.description: The month and year the renovation was completed or is due to be completed.

immediatePlansInd.description: Indicates that renovation is planned but dates are not finalized.

irregularInd.description: When true, the meeting room is an irregular shape, not the traditional rectangle or square.

dedicatedInd.description: When true, the room is used for a single purpose as indicated by the MeetingRoomType element.

featuredInd.description: When true, this is a featured meeting room for the property.

reservationRequiredInd.description: When true, a reservation must be made to dine in the restaurant.

featuredInd.description: When true, this is a featured restaurant for the property.

MealsOffered.description: Indicates the meals offered at a restaurant.

mainInd.description: When true, this is the primary cuisine type offered at the dining facility.

fee.description: A fee associated with an attraction.  This may be primarily used for attractions that are directly associated with the property.

courtesyPhoneInd.description: When true, a courtesy phone is available.  This signifies whether or not a courtesy phone for contacting the hotel is available at the attraction (e.g. often times these are availabe in airports).

primaryProgramInd.description: When true, identifies the primary loyalty program.

largestSeatingCapacity.description: The largest seating capacity available in the largest meeting room - generally this is for theatre-style room setup.

largestRoomSpace.description: The amount of room space for the largest unique meeting room at the facility.

FacilityUnitCount.description: Specifies the counts for the units at a facility such as the number of restaurants, the number of meeting rooms and the number of guest rooms.
